title: Champion Skin Idea: Sombrero Skarner
body:
GENTLEMEN.... BEHOLD! 
http://youtu.be/JL5H9WoA2W8 
SOMBRERO SKARNER

Note: This is not my skin idea. I simply found this video in the thread below and decided to make a thread for it.

Considering how well received this idea was in a seperate thread( http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/BQrOLALh-post-of-the-day-vi-got-a-male-skin-what-the-heck-riot#oembed-content-modal ), 
I think Riot can make many Skarner Players quite happy with Sombrero Skarner.

replies.body: Only if the theme plays when he dances. Globally. Or when he charges out of the bushes.

"Charges out of the bushes"

Oh my god yes
SI
SI!
oquei

As the original originator of Sombrero Skarner as an example in my thread (A thread apparently so popular that it has been elected thread of the day three days running and is staging a military coup for a fourth term) I fully endorse this as a wonderful idea. 

Additionally I would say that in light of the clear discrimination against the Latin American people (After all, there are American, European (World Cup skins, British accents), African (Score one diversity points: Lucian), Asian (obviously) and even Canadian skins) Riot should release a series of Carnivale themed skins including Sombrero Skarner. 

I would suggest Warlord Mordekaiser featuring a battle maracas and global laugh, speedy Gonzales Teemo, Piñata Sejuani and the previously community suggested dio de Los muertes Orianna skin.

Heck, I'm a Latin American player, and I find this funny as heck. If I had Skarner, I'd buy it in a blink just because he would be a crystal scorpion with a sombrero.

¡SIENTE MI AGUIJÓN! (FEEL MY STING!)
Let me fix it for you: "Día de los muertos" Orianna skin
It's been a while since Riot's made a "silly" skin. Time to bring it back. ARRIBA!!!!

Only if you could wear this skin on top of his other skins (as in, this would be more of an add-on than an independent skin; can you imagine battlecast skarner running into lane and then breaking out into song?)

That would be awesome if it could be pulled off - not a Sombrero Skarner 'skin' per say so much as a Skarner Sombrero 'accessory' where you can choose to attach it to any Skarner skin you want.

Would giving him a second, smaller Sombrero and mustache for his tail be doable too or would that be pushing it?

Oh si, si!

I think Skarner definitely deserves a new skin, so why not make it a silly one to counterbalance all the serious ones we've gotten lately?  Plus, he could even have some special quotes, like saying "Tu eres muerto." while attacking.

Also, the music.  That's a must.

Correction - EVERY quote must be a special quote. And they must all be exclusively in spanish!

Or at least have a heavy Mexican accent.

Also, everyone who says the music is a must speaks the truth.
Glad to see so many people enjoy this idea as much as I do. Lets keep voting this up until Riot gives in to the Sombreros y Maracas!
omg, that is....wonderful!!
skarner definitely needs more skins
Is not Day of Death popular in latin america? Why not make him this scorpion sceleton with sombrero and everything?
With Skarner not having any new skin since release I think we deserve better than that.
Hell yes, it may need a twist for spanish language version thou.

Even though I voted yes, I believe the option should be "¡Claro que si!"

Seeing as I finished a Spanish Final today, all of my yes. All of it. specially if Skarner gets his spanish VO lines with it.
Yes plz Riot make this happen.
